name: More Decor +
description:
This is the post-jam version of our Ludum Dare 45 entry. It fixes graphical and UI issues.

This is a puzzle game where you start with an empty room and you place furniture to earn points and unlock more furniture.

You earn 1 point for each piece of furniture that is placed on the grid. The points for each furniture piece is multiplied by 1 extra point for each side that is adjacent to a matching colour. If you place furniture on the side with the stripes then you are deducted 1 point.

Additional furniture will be unlocked based on the number of points you have collected.

There is no explicit end state but the goal is to unlock all of the furniture.

Controls:

  • Mouse
  • Click on the grid that is on the right side of the screen to select a piece of furniture. You can only select unlocked furniture
  • With furniture selected, click on a the grid on the left side of the screen to place the selected furniture.
  • With furniture selected, click the rotate button at the top of the screen to rotate the selected furniture.
  • Esc: Exit

Tools:

  • Unity 3D
  • Blender
  • Krita
  • Aseprite
  • Ableton Live Lite

mapleglaze: Coding and additional art

Veillantif: Art and music
